name: KWC prototype 2
description:
Aim: follow the red character on the ground

Controls:

WASD to move 

Space bar to jump

Mouse to control camera, when the mouse get close to the top of the screen it zooms out, when close to the bottom it zooms on the character

Please leave a comment or fill in the form below, I would love to get some feedback <3
